meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> hits your <radical>skin</radical> and creates smaller <kanji>wave</kanji>s. Those hit you too!
readingMnemonic: When each <kanji>wave</kanji> hits your body, you shout, "<reading>Ha</reading> (は)!" It's not like it's on purpose. When the wave crashes into you, the wind gets knocked right out of your mouth, making a HA sound.
